page.title: 17MERSTHAM VILLAGE
page.content:
{MERSTHAM}is a mainly residential area to the north of{REDHILL. }The{A23}runs to the west of Merstham from{LONDON TO {BRIGHTON.} At the very top of{SOUTH {MERSTHAM}runs the{M25}motorway. There are three shopping areas in Merstham. In{PORTLAND DRIVE}there are two Grocers, a Chinese Resraurant, a Newsagent, a Chemist and a Clothes Shop. In{BLETCHINGLY ROAD}there are several Antique Shops, a Bank, a Sub-Post Office, a Cafe, a Music Shop and a small Grocers. In{NUTFIELD ROAD there is a Dentist, a Sweetshop, a Grocer, two Newsagents, two Hairdressers, a Chinese Restaurant, a Shoe Shop, two Butchers, an Electrical Shop, a Sub-Post Office and a Pet Shop.
Off Bletchingly Road is{WELDON WAY} which has two churches{St THERESAS R.C
